game.name: Evil Robot Stole My Girlfriend
game.description:
Nothing could be more dangerous than separating from your loved one! Oh no! You might suffer from this dilemma as some evil robots are trying to steal your girlfriend. Have you ever imagined that the brave ninjas could dare to steal your girlfriend? It is time to take action against this bad act! Join Evil Robot Stole My Girlfriend and be prepared to rescue your girlfriends by shooting the evil robots and climbing on the stacks! Be careful as the gameplay is very fast!

Climb on the stacks that will keep falling simultaneously while they are building! It is not going to be easy at all since you have to save her from multiple sorts of robots. Put your fingers on your keyboard and mouse when you are playing it on your PC or tap the screen on the screen of your mobile phone to shoot all deadly aliens and help your love get back home safely in this Platform HTML5 game! Try to be as quick as you can to shoot your way through them!

Follow the old fighting tricks to win the battle and help this dude rescue his girlfriend safely! Common boys! You cannot leave this war in between. The entire world knows that you have the skill to behave like a boss so come forward to show your ability to lead your character like a pro. Track your score on the left top corner of the screen in this cool action-packed shooting game! Try out even more tricky and addictive shooter games and play online for free on atmegame.com with your friends!
